languages.text: {n}Навигатор испытующе смотрит на вас, затем склоняет голову.{/n} "Прошу прощения, Ваша Светлость. Я своими глазами видел страшную смерть всей корабельной команды, был вынужден выводить корабль из варпа экстренным маневром, а потом — сражаться с бывшими соратниками, обезумевшими и искаженными. Я устал".

traits.locale_text: {n}Навигатор испытующе смотрит на вас, затем склоняет голову.{/n} "Прошу прощения, ваше сиятельство. Я своими глазами видел страшную смерть всей корабельной команды, был вынужден выводить корабль из варпа экстренным маневром, а потом — сражаться с бывшими соратниками, обезумевшими и искаженными. Я... устал".

languages.text: {n}He gives you a searching look, then bows his head.{/n} "I beg your pardon, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I saw the terrible death of the entire crew with my own eyes, I was forced to bring the ship out of the warp by means of an emergency manoeuvre, and then I had to fight my former comrades, insane and twisted. I am tired."
languages.original_text: {n}Навигатор испытующе смотрит на вас, затем склоняет голову.{/n} "Прошу прощения, Ваша Светлость. Я своими глазами видел страшную смерть всей корабельной команды, был вынужден выводить корабль из варпа экстренным маневром, а потом — сражаться с бывшими соратниками, обезумевшими и искаженными. Я устал".

I saw the terrible death of the entire crew with my own eyes, was forced to bring the ship out of the warp by means of an emergency maneuver, and then had to fight my former comrades, insane and twisted. I am tired."

I saw the terrible death of the entire crew with my own eyes, I was forced to bring the ship out of the warp by means of an emergency manoeuvre, and then I had to fight my former comrades, insane and twisted. I am tired."

languages.text: {n}彼は様子を伺うような視線を送り、頭を下げた。{/n}「失礼いたしました、陛下。クルー全員の凄惨な死をこの目で目撃し、緊急操縦で船を歪みから脱出することを余儀なくされ、狂乱するかつての仲間たちと戦わなければならなかったのです。少々、疲れてしまいました」
languages.original_text: {n}He gives you a searching look, then bows his head.{/n} "I beg your pardon, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I saw the terrible death of the entire crew with my own eyes, I was forced to bring the ship out of the warp by means of an emergency manoeuvre, and then I had to fight my former comrades, insane and twisted. I am tired."

traits.locale_text: {n}彼は様子を伺うような視線を送り、頭を下げだ。{/n}「失礼いたしました、陛下。クルー全員の凄惨な死をこの目で目撃し、緊急操縦で船を歪みから脱出することを余儀なくされ、狂乱するかつての仲間たちと戦わなければならなかったのです。少々、疲れてしまいました」

languages.text: {n}他探询地打量着你，随后低下了头。{/n}“请原谅，大人。我亲眼目睹船员是如何惨死的，又不得不通过紧急操作把船从亚空间中拉出来，之后还不得不和我曾经的战友们刀剑相向。我真的太累了。”
languages.original_text: {n}He gives you a searching look, then bows his head.{/n} "I beg your pardon, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I saw the terrible death of the entire crew with my own eyes, I was forced to bring the ship out of the warp by means of an emergency manoeuvre, and then I had to fight my former comrades, insane and twisted. I am tired."

traits.locale_text: {n}他探询地打量着你，随后低下了头。{/n}“请原谅，大人。我亲眼目睹船员是如何惨死的，又不得不通过紧急操作把船从亚空间中拉出来，之后还不得不和我曾经的战友们刀剑相向。我真的太累了。”

languages.text: {n}Te estudia con la mirada e inclina la cabeza.{/n} «Le ruego que me disculpe, mi{mf|lord|lady}. He visto morir a la tripulación entera de forma espantosa, he tenido que sacar la nave de la disformidad mediante una maniobra de emergencia y llevo desde entonces luchando contra mis antiguos camaradas, retorcidos y enloquecidos. Estoy cansado».
languages.original_text: {n}He gives you a searching look, then bows his head.{/n} "I beg your pardon, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I saw the terrible death of the entire crew with my own eyes, I was forced to bring the ship out of the warp by means of an emergency manoeuvre, and then I had to fight my former comrades, insane and twisted. I am tired."

traits.locale_text: {n}Te estudia con la mirada e inclina la cabeza.{/n} «Le ruego que me disculpe, mi{mf|lord|lady}. He visto morir a la tripulación entera de forma espantosa, he tenido que sacar la nave de la disformidad mediante una maniobra de emergencia y llevo desde entonces luchando contra mis antiguos camaradas, retorcidos y enloquecidos. Estoy cansado».

languages.text: {n}Il vous dévisage quelques instants, avant d'incliner la tête.{/n} « Je vous demande pardon, Votre Seigneurie. J'ai vu tout mon équipage mourir dans d'atroces souffrances, j'ai dû exécuter une manœuvre d'urgence pour quitter le Warp et j'ai ensuite été forcé de combattre mes anciens camarades devenus fous. Je suis fatigué. »
languages.original_text: {n}He gives you a searching look, then bows his head.{/n} "I beg your pardon, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I saw the terrible death of the entire crew with my own eyes, I was forced to bring the ship out of the warp by means of an emergency manoeuvre, and then I had to fight my former comrades, insane and twisted. I am tired."

traits.locale_text: {n}Il vous dévisage quelques instants, avant d'incliner la tête.{/n} « Je vous demande pardon, Votre Seigneurie. J'ai vu tout mon équipage mourir dans d'atroces souffrances, j'ai dû exécuter une manœuvre d'urgence pour quitter le Warp et j'ai ensuite été forcé de combattre mes anciens camarades devenus fous. Je suis fatigué. »

languages.text: {n}Er blickt dich prüfend an und senkt dann den Kopf.{/n} "Ich bitte um Verzeihung, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich habe den schrecklichen Tod der gesamten Crew mit eigenen Augen gesehen, ich musste das Schiff mit einem Notfallmanöver aus dem Warp holen und dann meine früheren Kameraden bekämpfen, die dem Wahnsinn verfallen waren. Ich bin müde."
languages.original_text: {n}He gives you a searching look, then bows his head.{/n} "I beg your pardon, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I saw the terrible death of the entire crew with my own eyes, I was forced to bring the ship out of the warp by means of an emergency manoeuvre, and then I had to fight my former comrades, insane and twisted. I am tired."

traits.locale_text: {n}Er blickt dich prüfend an und senkt dann den Kopf.{/n} "Ich bitte um Verzeihung, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich habe den schrecklichen Tod der gesamten Crew mit eigenen Augen gesehen, ich musste das Schiff mit einem Notfallmanöver aus dem Warp holen und dann meine früheren Kameraden bekämpfen, die dem Wahnsinn verfallen waren. Ich bin müde."

languages.text: {n}Seni incelercesine bir bakış atıp ardından başını eğiyor.{/n} "Affınızı dilerim {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Mürettebatımın korkunç şekillerde ölmesine kendi gözlerimle şahit oldum, acil bir manevrayla gemiyi öteboyuttan çıkartmak zorunda kaldım, sonra da delirmiş ve çarpıtılmış eski yoldaşlarımla savaşmam gerekti. Yorgunum."
languages.original_text: {n}He gives you a searching look, then bows his head.{/n} "I beg your pardon, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. I saw the terrible death of the entire crew with my own eyes, I was forced to bring the ship out of the warp by means of an emergency manoeuvre, and then I had to fight my former comrades, insane and twisted. I am tired."

traits.locale_text: {n}Sana seni incelercesine bir bakış atıyor, ardından başını eğiyor.{/n} "Affınızı dilerim {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Mürettebatımın korkunç şekillerde ölmesine kendi gözlerimle şahit oldum, acil bir manevrayla gemiyi öteboyuttan çıkartmak zorunda kaldım, sonra da delirmiş ve çarpıtılmış eski yoldaşlarımla savaşmam gerekti. Yorgunum."
